channel.title: Need help
channel.description: Everytime i add in skillcape emotes for every skillcape it gives me errors... Can anyone help me make them work? and have emote on emote tab o.O i've fixed every skillcape... Im using hiyascape v2 as a base.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

public void capeEmote() { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14074) { //attack stillgfx(346, absY, absX); stillgfx(427, absY, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Attack"; string4UpdateRequired = true; }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("capeemote")){ capeEmote(); }

sendFrame126("@bla@emote", 186);

case 171: { customCommand("capeemote"); }
